reviewText: This takes me back fifty years ago and is well worth the money. I find this one of my best purchases.
This is a darling collection. I was so thrilled to find this. I never knew there had been a TV series.
GREAT! JUST GREAT! I think the 40's and 50's are the best! And no filth or sex and the violence is even funny.

I purchased  Topper  Volume  3  for  $ 7.69.  It is okay if you have never purchased the Topper series but a while back I bought  TV Classics  THE ADVENTURES OF TOPPER  for only  $ 3.99  which  has 9 episodes.  Volume 3  only has 3  episodes  and  2 episodes out of the  3 are in the other DVD.  there is a  bonus episode of Joe  Palooka  which I didn't think is very good.  Buy the  ADVENTURES OF TOPPER.  Is is a lot cheaper and a lot better.
Love they are putting the classics on DVD to add to my collection.
compliments volume one and two, nicely. good memories of simpler times.  sometimes, that's a great place to visit.
Got it as a Christmas gift for a Friend.
Old movie but good
Topper is so much fun to watch!
good movie
Always great to watch over and over for nostalgia
Love these classics
love this
LOVE this DVD
I remember watching this with my dad.

Beware of the DVD TV episodes from Alpha Video. They only give you 3 or 4 episodes per (overpriced) disc and Alpha has the absolute worst quality on these public domain shows - not that others have much better quality, but Alpha's the worst. Alpha DVD's should be in the dollar bins in stores. Beware !
Enjoying Topper once again.
For my son and he loved them.
great
Love Toppper old movies!
good old sitcom
Great movie. S. Watters.

Purchased for my 97 years young mother, brought a smile to her face. Most of the television shows & movies now of days are made for the younger generation has little interest to her. The quality of the dvd gets a two thumbs up from me. Thanks!
Fun to see, a bit dated and that's ok too. It's fun to revisit the mores of another age.
Love all the old  Cinema use to watch them with my Mom funny then still funny now
I was expecting the movie, not the series.  My fault.
fun to watch
Great series.
FUNNY

LOVE IT
Enjoyed!
We enjoyed the fast service and the movies were great.very good quality!!
Love these old programs.
LOVE these old TV shows. Nice to have since a lot of times there is nothing good on cable.
this is a excellent old t.v series that the whole family can enjoy with some great humor that everyone needs.
all is great
We loved it!  Old-fashioned humor, no X-rated material......refreshing!
no comment
Love, love, love these series.  Bought many of these series for my personal collection.
topper dvd's are excellent and funny and was great to see it again.thank you
great comedy for the entire family.  not seen a bad topper movie. something the whole family can watch together without editing.
I was not disappointed!  This is a must have DVD if you too enjoy going back to the days of our youth!  This was just as fun to watch today as it was 50 years ago.
Received quickly love the topper movies.  Watched them when I was growing up and my kids love them as its good clean comedy.
this is when television was still good clean family fun back from the golden age of television from golden era
Just the fact that you cannot find many Topper movies is a statement.  Another movie that makes you smile and laugh. Which is what movies should more often than not symbolize
Old people love some of the old movies & what better place to go than Amazon, it has never let me down!
enjoyable watching them after so long, I have volume one and two and three finish the series I think :  there is always something to think about
This is a really cute show...good... clean television...refreshing ....even tho it is a very old show, it is well made and fun to watch.

I had remembered it as much brighter, funnier so was very disappointed.
I only watched 1 1/2 episodes & that was it ...... no more.  The quality of
scenes is very blurry as are the voices.
This series of shows from the early days of TV remind us of when TV was actually decent to watch, intelligent, and well-written. Delightful ensemble cast. The dog is a delight. Great family viewing.
Bought for my mom who use to watch this when she was a young girl.  She said she loved it.

It's been decades since I have seen Topper on TV. As someone else stated this is Only Three episodes - and I'll add full of imperfections and NOT restored, and is in Black & White. There are no 'Bonus' features other than 'Joe Palooka' (also Black & White) - some stupid boxing story about 'Joe' going to Mexico to fight - and NOTHING to do with Topper. This DVD should be like in a discount bin for $2.00. The show itself is pretty good given the time period (1950's?). Scott M.

I enjoyed the Topper series when it originally ran on TV. The Volume 3 DVD I received was of very poor quality, and appeared to be de-laminating. I kept it because the time, effort, and postage to return it would have been more than the DVD cost.
very good and interesting movie A+
Great series to share with the family.

I bought this to supplement another Topper disc with 9 episodes. One of these episodes is a repeat of my other purchase
(TV Classics: The Adventures of Topper: Volume 2 ), but considering my age, and the episodes' ages I'm a happy camper.

I grew up with watching Topper and although I don't remember the episodes, I remember Leo G. Carroll and Neil the dog. The quality is not as sharp as the movies out today, but for the age of the series, I still enjoyed watching them.  Brings back a lot of memories.
If you like old classic films you'll love this.
horrible quality dvd
Very good.
great
I consider this as the first comedy series that involves ghosts. I love this old comedy and recommend it for everyone to see.

The Topper movies are my absolute favourites and make me and my oldest sister roar with laughter with these movies.  No matter how far apart we live.  If you want a great laugh and something that is still wholesome for the whole family, these movies are it.
